title: Fire on the rim
creator_credit: KCTS (Television station : Seattle, Wash.) and Barry Stoner
brief_description: This series looks at the historical, cultural, social and geological aspects of the varying effects of natural disaster and calamity on the peoples of the Pacific Rim.
